document_data.caption: Gorra alongside many [[crawling claw]] minions.
document_data.name: Gorra
document_data.mainbody: '''Gorra''', who was also known as '''Withers''', was an [[undead]] [[wight]] that acted as an overseer in the [[Tomb of the Nine Gods]].
document_data.History:
When he was alive, Withers was an [[Omuan]] [[engineer]] named Gorra, but when [[Acererak]] enslaved the city, he was put to work constructing the tomb and its various [[trap]]s.

When the tomb was complete, Gorra's traps proved to have worked the best, and [[Acererak]] rewarded him by transforming him into a wight, and letting him oversee the tomb.
document_data.Possessions:
Withers kept a ''[[manual of golems|manual of clay golems]]'' and owned a spellbook as befitted a wizard. 

He also kept a ''[[control gem]]'' for a [[gray slaad]] that was kept in the tomb, and had a skeletal [[songbird]] in a cage in his office, presumably as a pet.
